titles.title: To authorize the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy to enter into negotiations with representatives of the Government of Cuba to provide for increased cooperation between Cuba and the United States on drug interdiction efforts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 3/20/2001--Introduced. Authorizes the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy to enter into negotiations with Cuban Government representatives to provide for increased cooperation between Cuba and the United States on drug interdiction efforts.
